name: regoch-weber
title: Regoch Weber
description: Regoch Weber is the javascript framework for single page applications (browser, mobile apps, browser extensions, desktop apps). Intuitive and simple to use.
author: Sasa Mikodanic

scripts.dev-inst: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.deploy-inst: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install --production
